import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import CartCard from "../Component/CartCard"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { RootState } from "../Store/store"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Cart = () => { const cartItems = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.cart.items); const calculateTotal = () => { return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0); }; return (

Shopping Cart

Product

Quantity Total

{cartItems.length > 0 ? ( cartItems.map((item) => ( )) ) : (

Your cart is empty.

)}

Total

${calculateTotal().toFixed(2)}
Checkout with Card {/* Checkout with Card Button */} Checkout with Card
); }; export default Cart;
